user.description:
Choose which **Smart Vents** you would like to use for these **Areas**.
 
 If you do **NOT** see your **Smart Vent** listed here, be sure the **Smart Vent *Entities* (rather than the *Device*) are explicity assigned to an Area.** 
 Confirm you see them here: **Settings -> Areas & zones -> Area -> Entities**

second.description:
Choose which **Temperature Sensors** you would like to use for these **Areas**.
 
 If you do **NOT** see your Temperature Sensor listed here, be sure the **Temperature Sensor *Entities* (rather than the *Device*) are explicity assigned to an Area.** 
 Confirm you see them here: **Settings -> Areas & zones -> Area -> Entities**

third.description:
Choose your **Thermostat**.
 
 If you do **NOT** see your Thermostat listed here, be sure the **Thermostat *Entity* (rather than the *Device*) is explicity assigned to an Area.** 
 Confirm you see them here: **Settings -> Areas & zones -> Area -> Entities**
